string.text: Your clan is now at war with the {ISSUE_GIVER.LINK}'s lord. Your agreement with {ISSUE_GIVER.LINK} was canceled.
{SETTLEMENT_NAME} was raided by someone else. Your agreement with {ISSUE_GIVER.LINK} was canceled.
{ISSUE_SETTLEMENT} Needs Spears for Militia
The headman of {ISSUE_SETTLEMENT} needs spears for the militia.
I'm currently organizing the militia of the village, however we lack weapons to train and fight with. In particular, we have very few spears in the armoury.
How can I help?

I can handle training my people into militia fighters, but I need someone to find spears to fight with. You can buy them in the surrounding towns. You can even make your own, if you are a decent smith. We will need {SPEARS_AMOUNT} spears in total. I will pay you {REWARD_AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON} for the spears.
I will find the spears you need.

The young'uns of the village have all signed up to the newly forming militia. But I heard {QUEST_GIVER.NAME} doesnt have enough spears for even half of them men to train with, so they've been using wooden sticks to train with. I hope they dont end up having to use those same sticks in a real fight!.

{QUEST_GIVER.LINK}, a {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}headwomen{?}headman{\?} of {QUEST_SETTLEMENT} asked you to deliver {SPEARS_AMOUNT} spears to {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}him{\?} for the village militia. This will help boost the number of able militia in the village. 
 
 You have agreed to bring them {SPEARS_AMOUNT} spears as soon as possible. You will be paid {REWARD_AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON} for the spears. 
 
 The spears should be one handed polearms.
You now have enough spears to complete the quest. Return to {QUEST_SETTLEMENT} to hand them over.
You have failed to deliver {SPEARS_AMOUNT} spears to the villagers. They wont be able to properly train their militia. The Headman is disappointed.
You have delivered {SPEARS_AMOUNT} spears to the villagers. Their militia is ready to train and defend the village. The Headman and the villagers are grateful.
Thank you, {?PLAYER.GENDER}milady{?}sir{\\?}! We will make good use of these spears.
We await those spears, {?PLAYER.GENDER}milady{?}sir{\\?}.
Have you brought {SPEARS_AMOUNT} spears?
Yes. Here they are.
I'm working on it.
You don't have enough spears.
Collect one handed polearms
You have enough spears to complete the quest. Return to {QUEST_SETTLEMENT} to hand them over.
Food Crisis in {ISSUE_SETTLEMENT}
The town of {SETTLEMENT} is starving, {MERCHANT_NAME} needs help to restock the towns food supplies.

The food situation is bad, the town is starving. We've had to ration out all the food coming into the city but its getting harder and harder each day to put meals in front of people. If this keeps up for much longer, we will either all starve to death or the people will riot.
Can I help? I have some food to spare.

I thank you for your kindness, but we will require a larger amount of food to restock the city, enough to keep us going while we sort out the source of our food shortage. If you can supply Grain, Meat and Fish, I will pay you triple the average price for each. We will need at least 300 units of food in total to keep the town supplied.
I will head out to find food for the town.
I'm so hungry... oh, sorry, Did I walk into you? Its been so hard lately... I haven't eaten in so long... If only someone could help {QUEST_GIVER.NAME} bring more food into town...

{QUEST_GIVER.LINK}, a merchant in the town of {QUEST_SETTLEMENT} asked you to deliver {FOOD_AMOUNT} food to the town, to help fulfil the current food crisis. The food can either be Grain, Meat or Fish. \n \n You will be paid triple the average price of each good on delivery.
You now have enough food to complete the quest. Return to {QUEST_SETTLEMENT} to hand it over.
You have failed to deliver {FOOD_AMOUNT} food to {QUEST_SETTLEMENT}. The people continue to starve and {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is disappointed.
You have delivered {FOOD_AMOUNT} food to {QUEST_SETTLEMENT}. The people rejoice at the delivery of food. You have saved the people from starvation.
Thank you, {?PLAYER.GENDER}milady{?}sir{\\?}! This food will help us all.
We await the food supplies, {?PLAYER.GENDER}milady{?}sir{\\?}.
Have you brought {FOOD_AMOUNT} food?
Yes. Here is is.
I'm working on it.
You don't have enough food.
Collect Grain/Fish/Meat.
You have enough food to complete the quest. Return to {QUEST_SETTLEMENT} to hand them over.
You gave {FOOD_AMOUNT} meat. In return you got {GOLD_AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON}.
You gave {FOOD_AMOUNT} fish. In return you got {GOLD_AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON}.
You gave {FOOD_AMOUNT} grain. In return you got {GOLD_AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON}.
Rebellion in {ISSUE_SETTLEMENT}!
The people {ISSUE_SETTLEMENT} are angry at their mistreatment by their nobility. They are planning a rebellion!

I trust you, so listen closely. The people of {ISSUE_SETTLEMENT} have been mistreated for far to long, so I have been organising a `replacement` of the clan that runs this town. Most of the milita are with me, and I have several captains willing to lead as our leaders. We just need help in convincing the garrison who are still loyal to our current rulers.
I can help with this rebellion, what do you need of me?

We want to takeover with as little blood spilled as possible, but we will still need to fight the remaining loyalist garrison here in the town. Meet me here with your meen at midnight, and we will start the coup. I will bring my men as well.
Understood, I will meet with you soon.
Theres talk around that {QUEST_GIVER.NAME} has convinced the town milita to overthrow the ruling clan. They've denied everything, but I'm not so sure...

{QUEST_GIVER.LINK}, an artisan in the town of {QUEST_SETTLEMENT} has asked you to help the town militia overthrow the garrison of the town. He has asked you to wait for midnight, which is when the fight will begin. \n \n Wait in {QUEST_SETTLEMENT} until midnight.
{QUEST_GIVER.LINK}'s loyal soliders are ready for the aumbush at {SETTLEMENT}.
You have failed to join the rebels at {QUEST_SETTLEMENT}. The rebellion plan has been cancelled for now, {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is disapointed at your lack of commitment.
You helped the rebels of {QUEST_SETTLEMENT} take over the town. A new kingdom has been formed!
You decided to stay out of the fight. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} has called off the aumbush and is disapointed at your refusal to fight.
You were unable to defeat the loyalist soldiers of {QUEST_SETTLEMENT}, the rebellion was a failure!
Your clan is now at war with the rulers of {QUEST_SETTLEMENT}. It will be to difficult to help the rebels now.
{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} cancels your plans due to the siege of {SETTLEMENT}. The plans for the rebellion must now be put on hold.
{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} has finally sent a messenger telling you it's time to meet {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}him{\\?} and join the fight.
Wait until midnight, I will send someone to you when we are ready. Try not to draw attention to yourself before then.
It's not time yet. I'll send a runner for you when the time comes.
All right. I am waiting for your runner.
You'll know right away once the preparations are complete. Just don't leave town.
I can't just hang on here forever. Be quick about it.
I'm getting this together as quickly as I can.
Are you ready for the fight?
I need more time.
My wounds are still fresh. I need some time to recover.
A milita soldier walks up to you and quietly informs you that the men are in position.
Follow the soldier
Its done! The remaining troops loyal to the noble have been rounded up and taken prisoner. This is the start of a new begining for the people.
Bandit Army Heading to {ISSUE_SETTLEMENT}!
A Bandit army is heading to {ISSUE_SETTLEMENT} for a raid. The people of {ISSUE_SETTLEMENT} need help defending themselves.

Dire news has reached me, my scouts say that an army of rabble led by a self-proclaimed bandit `king` are making their way to our village right now, intent on taking everything we have. I've sent word to our nobles for help but I fear it may be to late by the time they get here.
That is troubling news, how will you defend yourselves?

Our militia will fight for our homes, but the more people we have the better. The enemy will be mostly comprised of rabble, just looters looking for easy money but they will have some better trained bandits as well. Will you help us defend the village?
Yes, I will help defend the village.
I heard that an army of bandits are heading their way here right now! We need to run, or hide or-or anything but stay here! Please, you must help us!

The village of {QUEST_SETTLEMENT} is about to be raided by a bandit army from a nearby hideout! {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} has asked you to stop the bandits from devastating the village. \n \n Stop the bandits from reaching {QUEST_SETTLEMENT}.
The Bandit army is raiding {QUEST_SETTLEMENT}! Protect them!.
You have taken to long to defeat the bandit army, forunately, this means the nobles rulling {QUEST_SETTLEMENT} have been able to respond in time, your agreement was cancelled.
You have defeated the bandit army that was going to raid {QUEST_SETTLEMENT}. The villagers are very grateful. The faction ruling the village have awarded you a bounty for defending the village.
You've failed to stop the bandit army. The bandits ravaged {QUEST_SETTLEMENT} and left.
Thank you. The bandits are on their way from a hideout close by. My scouts will show you where it is. We will pray for your sucess.
I don't think they'll be long now. I hope you can stop them in time.
Don't worry, we will crush their `army`.
Good, good. Thank you again.
Who the hell are you? This 'ere is an army, we're on our way to a village to collect some `taxes`. If you know whats good for you, you'll stay outta our way!
You wont be raiding around here anytime soon, We're here to stop you!
Direction to Bandits
{QUEST_GIVER.NAME} has marked the bandit hideout. The bandit army will head from there to the village
{BANDIT_CULTURE} Army
{NOBLE_NAME} wants {TARGET_NAME} Assassinated!
{NOBLE_NAME} wants to use the current war to get their enemy, {TARGET_NAME} killed.

You may know that I have had a long running fued with {TARGET.LINK}, their crimes are to long to list, yet I have not had an oppurtunity to deal with them myself. The current war however, is a perfect time to have them `dealt` with permanently, I trust you can do this for me?
How do you want them dealt with?
Find them and kill them, preferably during a battle. If killing prisoners is beneath you, deliver {TARGET_NAME} to me and I will finish them myself.
I will see what I can do.

I heard {QUEST_GIVER} was recently heard shouting `Will no one rid me of {TARGET_NAME}?!` to their soliders. I hear a fued between the two has claimed the lives of many, I wonder what they plan on doing next?
{NOTABLE} needs materials for {WORKSHOP}
{NOTABLE} requires a shipment of raw materials for their {WORKSHOP} as their regular suppliers have fallen short.
Ah, I'm in a bind here, my {WORKSHOP} has had to halt production, we simply do not have enough {MATERIAL}, owing to a merchant backing out of a deal at the last moment.
Perhaps I could find {MATERIAL} for you?
Thank you, If you could provide {MATERIAL_QUANTITY} {MATERIAL} to me, I can restart the workshops and continue production. I would be willing to give you {PRODUCT_QUANTITY} {PRODUCT} as payment.
I will find the materials you need.
{NOBLE} needs diplomat escorted to {SETTLMENT} to end war
I require the services of a trusted party to escort my diplomat to {SETTLMENT}, so that they may end the war between {FACTION_QUEST_GIVER} and {FACTION_WAR_TARGET}.
I require the services of a trusted party to escort my diplomat to {SETTLMENT}, so that they may end the war between {FACTION_QUEST_GIVER} and {FACTION_WAR_TARGET}.
I would be able to escort them.

Thank you, your task is simple. Take {DIPLOMAT} to {SETTLEMENT}, you will have immunity from harm from {FACTION_WAR_TARGET}, so be on your best behiavour, ensure their safety and once their business concludes bring them back to me.
Understood, I will bring them back safely.
{NOBLE} wants help establishing new Clan
{NOBLE} wants help establishing a new Clan for the {FACTION}, to strengthen it in the years to come. They require soliders to garrison {SETTLEMENT}, which will be the clans new home.
It is time for a new clan to be instated in our nation. I have decided that {SETTLEMENT} will be their new home, but I require more manpower before I can select the leaders of the Clan.
How can I help?

I require soliders, {SOLIDER_NUM} recruits will do but the better trained and equipped soliders you can find the better. The more you provide, the greater the clan that will be created. Your efforts will be greatly rewarded, and I'm sure the new leaders of the Clan will appreciate your efforts.
I will bring soliders to you.
{NOBLE} wants runaway villagers captured

Several villagers from the surrounding villages are protesting their treament from the clan of {NOBLE}. They have decided to run away to {SETTLEMENT_GOAL} to start a new life. {NOBLE} wants them bought back to {SETTLEMENT_START}.

Argh, these damn peasents! There is a mob in the town that say I have `mistreated` them for to long, that they will refuse to work if their demands are not met. Well, I refused their insolent requests and now they are planning to run to {SETTLEMENT_GOAL}!
What will you do?

I will punish them for their disobdience... but I first need them bought back here quickly, before they make it to the town of {SETTLEMENT_GOAL} as it will be become much harder to catch them, lest it cause a diplomatic incident. Find the villagers and bring them back here quickly!
Understood, I will bring them back here as fast as I can.

Many villagers from the countryside have come into the town today, they have made a list of demands for {NOBLE} or they will refuse to work. Last I heard though, {NOBLE} refused their demands, I wonder what the villagers will do now?
